name: breeding labradors
description: You placed a pair of Labradors into a small kennel to breed them.  Activate to let the pregnant dog out.

use_action.msg: You remove the pregnant dog from the kennel.

name: crated pregnant labrador
description: Sleeping Labrador with a swelling belly of puppies.  Be ready to help assist with the birth when she's fully gestated.

use_action.msg: The Labrador is about to give birth!  Once you start helping, you won't be able to let her go, so deliver those puppies!
use_action.not_ready_msg: The dog isn't ready to give birth yet.
use_action.//: 7 days, change to factor of season length later, average canine gestation 58-68 days

name: deliver labrador puppies
description: Activate when you're ready to start delivering puppies!

name: birthing labrador
description: After completing gestation, this Labrador has begun to give birth!  You need to help deliver the pups before you can leave her alone.

use_action.msg: You start delivering puppies!

name: resting labrador mother
description: This Labrador is resting from the intense labor.  It will take a few days to recover.

use_action.msg: The Labrador looks well-rested and ready for activity again.
use_action.not_ready_msg: The Labrador is still resting after intense labor.
use_action.//: 2 days
